pageSetting.title: 未认领明细

attribute.value: select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='CKYJGXMS'
select csz from xtb_xtcs where csmc='DKYJGXMS'

select.isEqual: select jgdh,jgmc,khh,zhdh,zhhm,qxsd.qxmc,case when zhbs='1' then '对公' when zhbs='2' then '对私' end zhbs,khrq,dqrq,khye,clye from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and gx.zlbl=100 and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a inner join csb_qxsdb qxsd on a.qx=qxsd.qxdh order by khh, zhbs asc ,qx,clye desc

select jgdh,jgmc,khh,zhdh,zhhm,qxsd.qxmc,case when zhbs='1' then '对公' when zhbs='2' then '对私' end zhbs,khrq,dqrq,khye,clye from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and gx.zlbl=100 and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a inner join csb_qxsdb qxsd on a.qx=qxsd.qxdh order by khh, zhbs asc ,qx,clye desc

select jgdh,jgmc,khh,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,qxsd.qxmc,case when zhbs='1' then '对公' when zhbs='2' then '对私' end zhbs,khrq,dqrq,khye,clye from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and gx.zlbl=100 and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a inner join csb_qxsdb qxsd on a.qx=qxsd.qxdh order by khh, zhbs asc ,qx,clye desc

select jgdh,jgmc,khh,zhdh,zzh,zhhm,qxsd.qxmc,case when zhbs='1' then '对公' when zhbs='2' then '对私' end zhbs,khrq,dqrq,khye,clye from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and gx.zlbl=100 and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.JGMC,zh.KHH,zh.ZHDH,zh.zzh,zh.zhhm,zh.QX,zh.ZHBS,zh.KHRQ,zh.DQRQ,sum(zh.zhye) over (partition by zh.khh) as khye, zh.zhye clye from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a inner join csb_qxsdb qxsd on a.qx=qxsd.qxdh order by khh, zhbs asc ,qx,clye desc
